channel.title: Mich here, helping you get new B2B clients on autopilot!
channel.description:
Hey guys!
I'm Michel from Brussels, Belgium.
I've been perfecting my cold outreach skills for the last 2 years and decided to create a list of resources that would have helped me 2 years ago.
It's called **ColdIQ** and all the resources are available for free. It's been sorted in an order that makes outbound sales easy to learn. Excited to hear your feedback and always down to connect.
Cheers
